mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, e.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM SCRAP WHERE userId like '%${userId}%' ORDER BY SCRAP_ID DESC ) e ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage} ORDER BY rn
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM scrap WHERE name like '%{value}%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCRAP (SCRAP_ID, USERID, NAME, COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_NAME, AD_ID, AD_TITLE, SCRAP_DATE) VALUES (scrap_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{name}, #{company_id},#{company_name}, #{ad_id}, #{ad_title}, SYSDATE)
